meaningMnemonic: It's an <kanji>injustice</kanji> that so many people in this world are <kanji>mediocre</kanji> and we can't all be a <vocabulary>prodigy</vocabulary> at something. Everyone deserves to be <vocabulary>unique</vocabulary>, but it just isn't true.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
